data.name: XSlideShowView
desc: View interface to display slide show presentations on.
This interface provides the necessary methods to enable an XSlideShow interface to display a presentation. The slide show can be displayed simultaneously on multiple views
**since**
OOo 2.4

methods.name: addMouseListener
desc: Add a mouse listener to the view.
This method registers a listener with the view, which will get called every time the mouse is clicked on the view.

methods.name: addMouseMotionListener
desc: Add a mouse motion listener to the view.
This method registers a listener with the view, which will get called every time the mouse is moved on the view.

methods.name: addPaintListener
desc: Add a listener to get notified when this view needs a repaint.
This method registers a listener with the view, which will get called every time the view needs an update of their screen representation.

methods.name: addTransformationChangedListener
desc: Add a listener to get notified when the transformation matrix changes.
This method registers a listener with the view, which will get called every time the transformation matrix changes.

methods.name: clear
desc: This method clears the whole view area.
The slide show uses this method to fully erase the view content. Since the slide show has no notion of view size, this is the only reliable way to wholly clear the view.

methods.name: getCanvas
desc: Get view canvas.
This method gets the underlying XCanvas to display on this view.

methods.name: getCanvasArea
desc: Get rectangle defining area inside of canvas device which this slide show view uses.

methods.name: getTransformation
desc: Query the current transformation matrix for this view.
This method returns the transformation matrix of the view. When notified via the transformation change listener, the show will be displayed using the new transformation.

methods.name: getTranslationOffset
desc: Query the current translation offset used to fill the physical screen while keeping aspect ratio.
This method returns the translation offset of the view of the view.

methods.name: removeMouseListener
desc: Revoke a previously registered mouse listener.

methods.name: removeMouseMotionListener
desc: Revoke a previously registered mouse move listener.

methods.name: removePaintListener
desc: Revoke a previously registered paint listener.

methods.name: removeTransformationChangedListener
desc: Revoke a previously registered transformation matrix change listener.

methods.name: setMouseCursor
desc: Change the mouse cursor currently in effect.
This method changes the mouse cursor currently in effect, for this view.
